thread.title: Sanah Kapur, felt like real-life sisters on 'Shaandaar' sets
thread.title_full: Sanah Kapur, Alia Bhatt felt like real-life sisters on 'Shaandaar' sets - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Sanah Kapur, felt like real-life sisters on 'Shaandaar' sets
text:
She will be seen sharing screen space with father Pankaj Kapoor and brother Shahid in her debut film "Shaandaar", but newbie Sanah says it was her dad who intimidated her more than the "Haider" star.
"More than Shahid, it was my father who was more intimidating. He is one of the best actors we have in the country, so when I ... Â»
